000: In the garden. The picture speaks for itself.
004: Finally I got inside. The house is almost totally empty
005: In every room there is a fireplace. Near the front door there is a desk and every corridor has a toilet and a shower. This makes me think this must have been a hotel-something.
006: The first artifact on the toilet-seat. Rare in an hotel, a towel left behind by the guests.
007: In the next room a chair. And a green finish on the walls
008: And a purple radiator. The owner must have had a fascination for strange color combinations. Mind that the mirror has not yet been touched by vandals.
